Package com.example.superheroes.dao

Interface LocationData

All Known Implementing Classes:
LocationDataDAO
public interface LocationData
This interface outlines all the database interactions involving superhero location and sightings.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    addLocation​(Location location)
    This method adds a location sighting to the database.
    boolean
    addSighting​(Sighting sighting)
    This method adds a superhero sighting to the database.
    boolean
    deleteLocation​(String coordinates)
    This method deletes a location entry from the database.
    boolean
    deleteSighting​(int id)
    This method deletes a sighting entry from the database.
    List<Location>
    getAllLocations()
    This method gets a list of locations where superheros/villans have been sighted.
    List<Sighting>
    getAllSightings()
    This method gets all the sightings of different superheros.

    getCoordinates()
    This method all location coordinates of sightings.

    • addSighting

      boolean addSighting​(Sighting sighting)
      This method adds a superhero sighting to the database.
      Returns:
      whether the database update was successful

      This method adds a location sighting to the database.
      Returns:
      whether the database update was successful

    • getAllSightings

      List<Sighting> getAllSightings()
      This method gets all the sightings of different superheros.
      Returns:
      a list of superhero sightings

    • getAllLocations

      List<Location> getAllLocations()
      This method gets a list of locations where superheros/villans have been sighted.
      Returns:
      a list of locations

    • getCoordinates

      List<String> getCoordinates()
      This method all location coordinates of sightings.
      Returns:
      a list of coordinates referring to locations

    • getSightingById

      Sighting getSightingById​(int id)
      This method gets a specific sighting from the database.
      Parameters:
      id - the sighting ID of the sighting
      Returns:
      the desired sighting object

    • getLocationById

      Location getLocationById​(String coordinates)
      This method gets a specific location from the database.
      Parameters:
      coordinates - the coordinates of the location
      Returns:
      the desired location object

    • updateSighting

      boolean updateSighting​(Sighting sighting)
      This method updates a sighting entry in the database.
      Parameters:
      sighting - the sighting subject to updating
      Returns:
      whether the update was successful

      boolean updateLocation​(Location location)
      This method updates a location entry in the database.
      Parameters:
      location - the location object subject to updating
      Returns:
      whether the update was successful

      Returns:
      whether the database update was successful
